doc.str: SHOCKWAVE GENERATION DEVICE AND METHOD OF DELIVERING A SHOCKWAVE

A fluid delivery device for delivering a flow of a gaseous fluid into a liquid medium, the device comprising means for generating an ultrasonic shockwave under the flow of gaseous fluid therethrough, the device being operable to launch the ultrasonic shockwave into the liquid medium.
COLDHARBOUR MARINE LIMITED | WHITESIDE, RICHARD, ERIC | REDGATE, DAVID, BENJAMIN | WELLS, TOBIAS, MARK
The Village, Maisies Way, South Normanton, Alfreton, Derbyshire DE55 2DS, GB
